title: Marlin Line
summary: The Marlin Line is an industrial mining line that sacrifices mining power and health for high speed and agility. Because of its low mining rate, it is generally advised for new players to use the more powerful Badger Line to start out with.
full_text:
Marlin Line
The Marlin Line is an industrial mining line that sacrifices mining power and health for high speed and agility. Because of its low mining rate, it is generally advised for new players to use the more powerful Badger Line to start out with.
